nodes.label: Pythagorean Identity
nodes.title: The fundamental trigonometric identity: cos^2(A) + sin^2(A) = 1.

nodes.label: Sine Rule
nodes.title: Relates the sides of a triangle to the sines of its angles: a/sin A = b/sin B = c/sin C.

nodes.label: Cosine Rule
nodes.title: Relates the lengths of sides of a triangle to the cosine of one of its angles: a^2 = b^2 + c^2 – 2bc cos A.

nodes.label: Cosine of Angle Difference Formula
nodes.title: Formula for cos(A–B): cos(A–B) = cos A cos B + sin A sin B.

nodes.label: Cosine of Angle Sum Formula
nodes.title: Formula for cos(A+B): cos(A+B) = cos A cos B – sin A sin B.

nodes.label: Double Angle Formula for Cosine
nodes.title: Formula for cos(2A): cos 2A = cos^2 A – sin^2 A.

nodes.label: Sine of Angle Sum Formula
nodes.title: Formula for sin(A+B): sin(A+B) = sin A cos B + cos A sin B.

nodes.label: Sine of Angle Difference Formula
nodes.title: Formula for sin(A–B): sin(A–B) = sin A cos B – cos A sin B.

nodes.label: Tangent of Angle Sum Formula
nodes.title: Formula for tan(A+B): tan(A+B) = (tan A + tan B) / (1 – tan A tan B).

nodes.label: Tangent of Angle Difference Formula
nodes.title: Formula for tan(A–B): tan(A–B) = (tan A – tan B) / (1 + tan A tan B).

nodes.label: Double Angle Formula for Sine
nodes.title: Formula for sin(2A): sin 2A = 2 sin A cos A.

nodes.label: Double Angle Formula for Tangent
nodes.title: Formula for tan(2A): tan 2A = (2 tan A) / (1 – tan^2 A).

nodes.label: Alternative Double Angle Formula for Sine
nodes.title: Alternative forms for sin(2A), such as sin 2A = 2 tan A / (1 + tan^2 A).

nodes.label: Alternative Double Angle Formula for Cosine
nodes.title: Alternative forms for cos(2A), such as cos 2A = 1 – 2 sin^2 A or cos 2A = 2 cos^2 A – 1.

nodes.label: Half Angle Formula for Cosine
nodes.title: Formula for cos^2 A in terms of cos 2A: cos^2 A = ½ (1 + cos 2A).

nodes.label: Half Angle Formula for Sine
nodes.title: Formula for sin^2 A in terms of cos 2A: sin^2 A = ½ (1 – cos 2A).

nodes.label: Product-to-Sum Formula for Cosine
nodes.title: Formula: 2 cos A cos B = cos(A+B) + cos(A–B).

nodes.label: Product-to-Sum Formula for Sine and Cosine
nodes.title: Formula: 2 sin A cos B = sin(A+B) + sin(A–B).

nodes.label: Product-to-Sum Formula for Sine
nodes.title: Formula: 2 sin A sin B = cos(A–B) – cos(A+B).

nodes.label: Product-to-Sum Formula for Cosine and Sine
nodes.title: Formula: 2 cos A sin B = sin(A+B) – sin(A–B).

nodes.label: Sum-to-Product Formula for Cosine
nodes.title: Formula: cos A + cos B = 2 cos((A+B)/2) cos((A–B)/2).

nodes.label: Difference-to-Product Formula for Cosine
nodes.title: Formula: cos A – cos B = –2 sin((A+B)/2) sin((A–B)/2).

nodes.label: Sum-to-Product Formula for Sine
nodes.title: Formula: sin A + sin B = 2 sin((A+B)/2) cos((A–B)/2).

nodes.label: Natural numbers (N)
nodes.title: The set of counting numbers starting from 1, i.e., {1, 2, 3, ...}.

nodes.label: Integers (Z)
nodes.title: The set of whole numbers including negative numbers, zero, and positive numbers.

nodes.label: Rational numbers (Q)
nodes.title: Numbers that can be expressed as a ratio of two integers (fractions, terminating or repeating decimals).

nodes.label: Irrational numbers
nodes.title: Numbers that cannot be expressed as a ratio of two integers; their decimal expansions are non-repeating and non-terminating.

nodes.label: Real numbers (R)
nodes.title: All rational and irrational numbers.

nodes.label: Complex numbers (C)
nodes.title: Numbers of the form a + ib, where a and b are real numbers and i is the imaginary unit.

nodes.label: Addition of rational numbers
nodes.title: Combining two rational numbers to find their sum.

nodes.label: Subtraction of rational numbers
nodes.title: Finding the difference between two rational numbers.

nodes.label: Multiplication of rational numbers
nodes.title: Finding the product of two rational numbers.

nodes.label: Division of rational numbers
nodes.title: Finding the quotient when one rational number is divided by another (nonzero) rational number.

nodes.label: Properties of arithmetic operations
nodes.title: Commutative, associative, and distributive laws governing addition and multiplication.

nodes.label: Order of operations
nodes.title: The rules that define the sequence in which operations are performed (PEMDAS/BODMAS).

nodes.label: Number line representation
nodes.title: Visualizing numbers and their order on a line.

nodes.label: Negative numbers in context
nodes.title: Interpreting negative numbers in real-life situations, such as debt or temperature.

nodes.label: Fractions, decimals, and percentages equivalence
nodes.title: Understanding that fractions, decimals, and percentages are different representations of rational numbers.

nodes.label: Prime numbers
nodes.title: Natural numbers greater than 1 that have no positive divisors other than 1 and themselves.

nodes.label: Prime factorization
nodes.title: Expressing a number as a product of its prime factors.

nodes.label: Scientific notation
nodes.title: Expressing numbers in the form a × 10ⁿ, where 1 ≤ a < 10 and n is an integer.

nodes.label: Complex conjugate
nodes.title: For a complex number a + ib, the conjugate is a - ib.

nodes.label: Modulus of a complex number
nodes.title: The distance of a complex number from the origin in the complex plane.

nodes.label: Argand diagram
nodes.title: A graphical representation of complex numbers on the complex plane.

nodes.label: Geometric construction of √2 and √3
nodes.title: Constructing the square roots of 2 and 3 using geometric methods.

nodes.label: Proof that √2 is irrational
nodes.title: Mathematical proof that the square root of 2 cannot be expressed as a ratio of two integers.

nodes.label: Sequences and series
nodes.title: Ordered lists of numbers and their sums, including arithmetic and geometric types.

nodes.label: Arithmetic sequence
nodes.title: A sequence where each term is obtained by adding a constant to the previous term.

nodes.label: Geometric sequence
nodes.title: A sequence where each term is obtained by multiplying the previous term by a constant.

nodes.label: Sum of arithmetic series
nodes.title: The sum of the terms in an arithmetic sequence.

nodes.label: Sum of geometric series
nodes.title: The sum of the terms in a geometric sequence, including finite and infinite cases.
